subject: Paralysis
Snowboarding
Guillain-Barre Syndrome
Archives and Records
lead_paragraph: Paralyzed but for his hands by a rare nervous disorder, Jake Burton Carpenter scribbled thoughts in a loose diary of a man confronting his mortality.
